name: Esteem
description: Discover and build a community, niche and be rewarded for blogs, votes, contributions and reward esteemed friends, followers. Get paid crypto, earn tokens that has real cash value and you can gift tokens to your friends.  Features  - Discover community, a niche, find a niche. - Find unique blogs in any subject. - Engage with your community by discussing, sharing your thoughts on specific topic. - Like posts to pay bloggers as well as earn reward, cash, token. - Share and post what you love doing and earn rewards by engaging and gaining followers. - Boost and promote your posts to get even better exposure and better earnings. - Invite people to your community. - Exchange or cash out your earnings for goods and services, help others to earn free cash. - Send your earnings to any friends or users, etc. - Follow interesting authors, bloggers. - Search your friends and bloggers you are following. - Get notified to stay in touch with your community and discussions you are involved in. - Search for interesting tags/categories of blogs, people. - Personalize your profile. - Host your blogs for free  More info at https://esteem.app Contact us info@esteem.app
